1:
I will always thank Yahweh;\q2 I will constantly praise him.


\q1
2:
I will praise Yahweh for what he has done.\q2 All those who are oppressed should listen to me and rejoice.
\q1
3:
Join with me in telling others that Yahweh is great!\q2 You and I should together proclaim how glorious he is!



\q1
4:
I prayed to Yahweh, and he answered my prayer;\q2 he rescued me from all those who caused me to be afraid.
\q1
5:
Those who trust that he will help them will be joyful;\q2 they will never have to look down in disgrace.
\q1
6:
I was miserable, but I called out to Yahweh, and he heard me.\q2 He rescued me from all my troubles.


\q1
7:
An angel from Yahweh guards those who have an awesome respect for him,\q2 and the angel rescues them.
\q1
8:
Try for yourself, and you will experience that Yahweh is good to you!\q2 How fortunate are those who trust him to protect them.
\q1
9:
All you who belong to him, have an awesome respect for him!\q2 Those who do that will always have the things that they need.


\q1
10:
Lions are usually very strong, but sometimes even young lions are hungry and become weak.\q2 However, those who trust in Yahweh will have everything that they need.
\q1
11:
You who are my students, come and listen to me,\q2 and I will teach you how to have an awesome respect for Yahweh.


\q1
12:
If any of you wants to enjoy life\q2 and have a good long life,
\q1
13:
do not speak what it evil!\q2 Do not tell lies!
\q1
14:
Refuse to do evil; instead, do what is good!\q2 Always try hard to enable people to live peacefully with each other!



\q1
15:
Yahweh carefully watches over those who act righteously;\q2 he always responds to them when they call to him for help.
\q1
16:
But Yahweh works against those who do what is evil.\q2 After they die, people here on earth will forget them completely.
\q1
17:
Yahweh hears righteous people when they call out to him;\q2 he rescues them from all their troubles.


\q1
18:
Yahweh is always ready to help those who are discouraged;\q2 he rescues those who have no hope for anything good.
\q1
19:
Righteous people may have many troubles,\q2 but Yahweh rescues them from all those troubles.
\q1
20:
Yahweh protects them from being harmed;\q2 when their enemies attack them,
\q3 they will not break any bones of those righteous people.



\q1
21:
Disasters will kill the wicked people,\q2 and Yahweh will punish those who oppose righteous people.
\q1
22: Yahweh will save those who serve him.\q2 He will not condemn those who trust in him.
